    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentPage

        public static int getCurrentPage(java.util.List<?> list)
        Returns the current page for this list. If it is a page, returns the Page.getCurrentPage() result, otherwise, zero.

      • getTotalCount

        public static int getTotalCount(java.util.List<?> list)
        Returns the total count for this list. If it is a page, returns the Page.getTotalCount() result, otherwise, the list size.

      • hasResults

        public static boolean hasResults(java.util.List<?> list)
        Checks whether the given list has at least one result
